title: Frisbee Golf
description: SYDE GSA's Frisbee golf event went well!! A fun event to make up for bad weather from last term. We enjoyed the end of summer weather with a high of 27 degrees.

title: General Trivia Night
description: InSYDErs hosted a general trivia event with prizes, free food and SYDE GSA stickers! InSYDErs and new BME students enjoyed coffee and donuts while competing for candy prizes. The winning team took home the candy!

title: Pumpkin Carving
description: Join us for a festive pumpkin carving event! Get into the Halloween spirit with fellow InSYDErs. We'll provide the pumpkins and carving tools - just bring your creativity and enthusiasm!
